member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Creates an empty spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.#ctor(char)
member.summary: Constructor. Creates an empty spline graph with a given name.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.#ctor(Unigine.Ptr{SplineGraph})
member.summary: Constructor. Creates a spline graph by copying a given source spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getLength(int) const
member.summary: Returns the length of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getNumPoints const
member.summary: Returns the total number of points in the spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getNumSegments const
member.summary: Returns the total number of segments in the spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setPoint(int,Unigine.Math.Vec3)
member.summary: Sets new coordinates for the point with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getPoint(int) const
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the point with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentEndPoint(int,Unigine.Math.Vec3)
member.summary: Sets the coordinates of the end point for the segment with a given index.
member.param: Segment end point coordinates to be set.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentEndPoint(int) const
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the end point for the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentEndPointIndex(int) const
member.summary: Returns the index of the end point for the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentEndTangent(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the tangent coordinates for the end point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentEndTangent(int) const
member.summary: Returns the tangent coordinates for the end point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentEndUpVector(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the "up" vector coordinates for the end point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentEndUpVector(int) const
member.summary: Returns the "up" vector coordinates for the end point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentStartPoint(int,Unigine.Math.Vec3)
member.summary: Sets the coordinates of the start point for the segment with a given index.
member.param: Segment start point coordinates to be set.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentStartPoint(int) const
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the start point for the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentStartPointIndex(int) const
member.summary: Returns the index of the end point for the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentStartTangent(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the tangent coordinates for the start point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentStartTangent(int) const
member.summary: Returns the tangent coordinates for the start point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.setSegmentStartUpVector(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the "up" vector coordinates for the start point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getSegmentStartUpVector(int) const
member.summary: Returns the "up" vector coordinates for the start point of the segment with a given index.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.addPoint(Unigine.Math.Vec3)
member.summary: Adds a point with specified coordinates to the spline graph.
member.returns: Current number of points in the spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.addSegment(int,Unigine.Math.vec3,Unigine.Math.vec3,int,Unigine.Math.vec3,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Adds a segment to the spline graph.
member.returns: Number of segments in the spline graph if a segment was adds successfully; otherwise, -1

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.calcSegmentPoint(int,float) const
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the point at the parametrically specified position on the segment (along the T axis).
member.param: Position of the point on the segment, specified parametrically along the T (times axis) in the [0.0f, 1.0f] range.
member.returns: Coordinates of the point on the given segment.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.calcSegmentTangent(int,float) const
member.summary: Returns the tangent coordinates for the point at the parametrically specified position on the segment (along the T axis).
member.param: Position of the point on the segment, specified parametrically along the T (times axis) in the [0.0f, 1.0f] range.
member.returns: Tangent coordinates for the point on the given segment.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.calcSegmentUpVector(int,float) const
member.summary: Returns the "up" vector coordinates for the point at the parametrically specified position on the segment (along the T axis).
member.param: Position of the point on the segment, specified parametrically along the T (times axis) in the [0.0f, 1.0f] range.
member.returns: "Up" vector coordinates for the point on the given segment.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.clear
member.summary: Clears the spline graph.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.load(char)
member.summary: Loads the spline graph from the specified XML-file.
member.param: Name of the XML-file to load the spline graph from.
member.returns: true if the spline graph was successfully loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.removePoint(int,bool)
member.summary: Removes a point with a given index from the spline graph.
member.param: Merge flag. When there are two segments attached to the point, use true to merge these segments into one; false removes all segments attached to the point (by default).

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.splitPoint(int)
member.summary: Splits the point with the specified index into N points, where N is the number of segments attached to the point. The number of points in the graph shall increase by N-1. All new points will be attached to the corresponding segments.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.weldPoints(Unigine.Vector{int,int,Unigine.VectorAllocator})
member.summary: Merges all points with given indices into one. All common segments between these points shall be removed. All points with given indices are removed from the graph, except for the one having the minimum index value, all segments shall be attached to this point. Resulting point shall be moved to the position of the first point in the given array.
member.param: Array containing indices of points to be merged into one.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.removeSegment(int,bool)
member.summary: Removes the segment with a given index.
member.param: Use true to remove segment with its starting and ending points, or false to remove the segment only.Points will be removed only in case if they do not belong to other segments. After removal, the last element of the vector of spline graph segments shall be moved to the position of the one removed.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.save(char) const
member.summary: Saves the spline graph to the specified XML-file.
member.param: Name of the XML-file to save the spline graph to.
member.returns: true if the spline graph was successfully saved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.insertPointToSegment(int,float)
member.summary: Inserts a new point into the given segment. The point is parametrically specified on the T (times axis) in the [0.0f, 1.0f] range from the segment's start point.
member.param: Coordinate of the new point to be added along the horizontal T (times) axis in the range [0.0f, 1.0f].

member.name: M:Unigine.SplineGraph.getPointSegmentsIndices(int,Unigine.Vector{int,int,Unigine.VectorAllocator}) const
member.summary: Retrieves indices of all segments attached to the specified point and puts them to the given index buffer.
member.param: Index buffer to which segment indices will be added.
